alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 7:03PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHERN LATAH...NORTHERN NEZ PERCE...NORTH CENTRAL LEWIS...NORTHEASTERN GARFIELD AND SOUTHEASTERN WHITMAN COUNTIES... At 602 PM PST, an area of heavy snow was located near Genesee, or 7 miles north of Lapwai, moving east at 35 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. Locations impacted include... Moscow, Lapwai, Genesee, Troy, Juliaetta, Culdesac, Kendrick, Colton, Uniontown, Peck, Spalding, Southwick, Gifford, Joel, and Lenore. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 289 and 293, between mile markers 298 and 309, and between mile markers 315 and 345. U.S. Highway 12 in Idaho between mile markers 11 and 36. U.S. Highway 195 in Washington between mile markers 0 and 10. Icy roads are possible as the snow melts on the roads then quickly refreezes. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
